name: typeinclude
author: NexusTools
description: node-typeinclude makes it easy to include typescript files into your nodejs project at runtime, without the need to recompile every time you change something. And provides a few extensions to the TypeScript language via a pre-processor.

scripts.test-coverage: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --timeout 20000 --globals __typeinclude__ --check-leaks --require test/support/env --bail --reporter spec test/
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --timeout 20000 --globals __typeinclude__ --check-leaks --require test/support/env --reporter spec test/
